title: KABOOM Sounds - Sound Effects
description: Bring your explosions to life with this sounds! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


In this sound effects pack I brought a series of sounds that can be used for explosive moments in games.


Strong, weak, distant explosions, with ambience, with more materials like glass and water, I'm sure it will be useful for your game if it has these explosive elements.


There are also other complementary sounds, such as: Removing the grenade pin, throwing a grenade, grenade falling to the ground, muffled explosions, among others.


These explosion sounds are widely used in games, sometimes even to show a sign on the screen, because of this I believe it is very worth the investment.


I bought some real explosives to make these sounds, so the sounds are very realistic,


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Here's the list of Folder, in each folder you'll find at least 3 files.


  • Activated_Bomb_v1
  • Atomic_Bomb_v1
  • Bomb_Timer_v1
  • Car_Explode_v1
  • Cluster_Grenade_v1
  • Cut_Wire_v1
  • Drop_Grenade_v1
  • Electric_Bomb_v1
  • Explode_Crate
  • Generic_Explosion_v1
  • Grenade_Launcher_v1
  • Molotov_v1
  • Molotov_v2
  • Muffled_Explosion_v1
  • Pin_Grenade_v1
  • Pop_Balloon
  • Raw_Explosion
  • Saturated_v1
  • Simple_Grenade_v1
  • Simple_Grenade_v2
  • Simple_Grenade_v3
  • Simple_Grenade_v4
  • Simple_Grenade_v5
  • Throw_Grenade_v1
  • Tiny_Explosion
  • UnderWater_Explosion_v1
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 109

Number of Audio Cues: 109

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contains "loop" on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
